DOC.brief_summary: A growing interest in monitoring cardiac output (CO) non-invasively has emerged, however its determination has been difficult using the standard approaches. The aim of the study is to evaluate the accuracy and precision of pulse contour analysis (PCA) as compared to cardiac magnetic resonance imaging (CMR).
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Nexfin Pulse Contour Analysis and Cardiac Magnetic Resonance Imaging for the Measurement of Cardiac Output
DOC.criteria: indication for CMR contraindication for CMR claustrophobia no consent obtained
